feature_model.name: Trim
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Trim (f_Trim) :m PTVL (f_PTVL) :m Trans (f_Trans) :m Series (f_Series) :o Ice (f_Ice) :g [1, 1] : Pack 1 (f_Pack_1) : Pack 2 (f_Pack_2) :g [1, 1] : 20 (f_20) : 10 (f_10) :g [1, 1] : Leather (f_Leather) : Cloth (f_Cloth)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~f_20 or f_Pack_2 constraint_2:~f_20 or f_Leather constraint_3:~f_Pack_1 or f_10 constraint_4:~f_Cloth or f_10
